wonderworld,183,143,4	script	Egg Informations	869,{

	mes "[ Informations ]";
	mes "เลือกรายการที่ต้องการดูรายละเอียด";
	next;
	switch(select("Costume Shadows Egg:กล่อง Gods:Temporal Egg:WoE Egg:Sealed Egg:Refine Ticket Egg:Rare Drops Egg:Rare Items Egg:Lucky Egg:King Boss Egg"))
	{
		case 1:
			for ( set .@i, 0; .@i < getarraysize(.Shadows); set .@i, .@i+1 )
				mes ""+ (.@i+1) +". <ITEM>"+ getitemname(.Shadows[.@i]) +"<INFO>"+ .Shadows[.@i] +"</INFO></ITEM>";
			close;
			
		case 2:
			for ( set .@i, 0; .@i < getarraysize(.Gods); set .@i, .@i+1 )
				mes ""+ (.@i+1) +". <ITEM>"+ getitemname(.Gods[.@i]) +"<INFO>"+ .Gods[.@i] +"</INFO></ITEM>";
			close;
			
		case 3:
			for ( set .@i, 0; .@i < getarraysize(.Temporal); set .@i, .@i+1 )
				mes ""+ (.@i+1) +". <ITEM>"+ getitemname(.Temporal[.@i]) +"<INFO>"+ .Temporal[.@i] +"</INFO></ITEM>";
			close;
		
		case 4:
			for ( set .@i, 0; .@i < getarraysize(.WoE); set .@i, .@i+1 )
				mes ""+ (.@i+1) +". <ITEM>"+ getitemname(.WoE[.@i]) +"<INFO>"+ .WoE[.@i] +"</INFO></ITEM>";
			close;
			
		case 5:
			for ( set .@i, 0; .@i < getarraysize(.Seal); set .@i, .@i+1 )
				mes ""+ (.@i+1) +". <ITEM>"+ getitemname(.Seal[.@i]) +"<INFO>"+ .Seal[.@i] +"</INFO></ITEM>";
			close;
			
		case 6:
			for ( set .@i, 0; .@i < getarraysize(.Ticket); set .@i, .@i+1 )
				mes ""+ (.@i+1) +". <ITEM>"+ getitemname(.Ticket[.@i]) +"<INFO>"+ .Ticket[.@i] +"</INFO></ITEM>";
			close;
			
		case 7:
			for ( set .@i, 0; .@i < getarraysize(.Drops); set .@i, .@i+1 )
				mes ""+ (.@i+1) +". <ITEM>"+ getitemname(.Drops[.@i]) +"<INFO>"+ .Drops[.@i] +"</INFO></ITEM>";
			close;
			
		case 8:
			for ( set .@i, 0; .@i < getarraysize(.Items); set .@i, .@i+1 )
				mes ""+ (.@i+1) +". <ITEM>"+ getitemname(.Items[.@i]) +"<INFO>"+ .Items[.@i] +"</INFO></ITEM>";
			close;
			
		case 9:
			for ( set .@i, 0; .@i < getarraysize(.Lucky); set .@i, .@i+1 )
				mes ""+ (.@i+1) +". <ITEM>"+ getitemname(.Lucky[.@i]) +"<INFO>"+ .Lucky[.@i] +"</INFO></ITEM>";
			close;
			
		case 10:
			for ( set .@i, 0; .@i < getarraysize(.King); set .@i, .@i+1 )
				mes ""+ (.@i+1) +". <ITEM>"+ getitemname(.King[.@i]) +"<INFO>"+ .King[.@i] +"</INFO></ITEM>";
			close;
	}
	end;
	
OnInit:
	setarray .Shadows[0],12912,14198,12913,12914,12919,12922,61010,61001,16682,12412,16770,7776,16666,13571,12915,6665,12103,12900,12901,12909,13741,24215,24214,24029,24097,24098,24162,24051,24039,24045,24216,24186,24198,24180,24184,24185,24182,24181,24183,24211,24210,24069,24217,24218,24232,24231,24062,24236,24237,24054,24061,24109,24110,24048,24064,24132,24136,24137,24134,24133,24135,24219,24052,24032,24030,24193,24205,24156,24166,24167,24037,24043,24195,24070,24161,24057,24071,24222,24042,24036,24223,24227,24192,24204,24233,24194,24206,24157,24209,24208,24220,24059,24067,24160,24190,24202,24225,24226,24224,24163,24100,24101,24099,24107,24108,24055,24084,24088,24089,24086,24085,24087,24238,24239,24065,24114,24118,24119,24116,24115,24117,24187,24199,24028,24049,24091,24092,24197,24196,24120,24124,24125,24122,24121,24123,24033,24126,24130,24131,24128,24127,24129,24164,24056,24158,24027,24150,24151,24093,24031,24094,24072,24075,24063,24221,24040,24034,24176,24179,24170,24175,24171,24174,24177,24178,24172,24173,24081,24083,24082,24073,24076,24105,24106,24104,24095,24096,24166,24167,24165,24035,24041,24047,24245,24244,24243,24060,24046,24213,24212,24053,24200,24058,24066,24068,24026,24024,24025,24021,24023,24022,24018,24020,24019,24074,24077,24154,24153,24155,24152,24229,24230,24228,24112,24113,24111,24079,24080,24078,24090,24144,24148,24149,24146,24145,24147,24003,24009,24001,24007,24005,24002,24011,24008,24000,24006,24004,24010,24138,24142,24143,24140,24139,24141,24169,24168,24235,24234,24189,24201,24188,24044,24038,24102,24103,24191,24203,24050,24159,24254;
	setarray .Gods[0],909,713,512,705,61014,61010,7227,705,914,511,949,12710,6380,985,984,7227,7642,607,608,515,534,603,617,7539,12596,6417,7776,6665,61001,35005,35006,35007,35008,35009,35010;
	setarray .Temporal[0],22000,22001,22002,22003,22004,22005,61001;
	setarray .WoE[0],12912,14198,12913,12914,12919,12922,61010,61001,12900,12901,12909,16755,16753,15046,15047,15048,2586,2587,2483,2484,2485;
	setarray .Seal[0],12912,14198,12913,12914,12919,12922,61010,61001,16682,12412,7776,13571,12915,6665,12103,12900,12901,12909,16666,16770,4480,4539,4535,4536,4537,4540,4541,4542,4538,4543,4544,4481,4482,4483,4484,4485,4486,4487,4488,4489,4490,4491,4492,4493,4494,4495,4496,4497,4498,4499,4500,4501,4502,4503,4504;
	setarray .Ticket[0],6456,6457,12912,14198,12913,12914,12919,12922,61010,61001,12900,12901,12909,6229,6233,6230,6234,6231,6235,6238,6239,6228,6232;
	setarray .Drops[0],909,713,512,705,61014,61010,7227,705,914,511,949,12710,6380,985,984,7227,7642,607,608,515,534,603,617,7539,12596,6417,605,606,610,716,601,602,639,621,642,641,631,630,623,660,626,637,620,635,622,624,625,640,638,639,661,627,633,619,611,610,63010,61001;
	setarray .Items[0],909,713,512,705,61014,61010,7227,705,914,511,949,12710,6380,985,984,7227,7642,607,608,515,534,603,617,7539,12596,6417,605,606,610,716,601,602,639,621,642,641,631,630,623,660,626,637,620,635,622,624,625,640,638,639,661,627,633,619,611,610,35450,2344,2346,2348,2350,61001;
	setarray .Lucky[0],35453,61006,7619,7620,12596,12103,16755,16753,16682,14198,12913,12914,12915,12919,6380,6665,7776,12710,6484,14586,12211,61001,7539,18130,1443,28705,1680,13454,21015,28106,2025,28007,16040,1995,28604,13327,13127,1498,1939,1839;
	setarray .King[0],12912,14198,12913,12914,12919,12922,61010,61001,16682,12412,7776,13571,12915,6665,12103,12900,12901,12909,7227,16770,60006,60004,14536,12221,14515,6438,6439,6380,6225,6226,12710,6607,6608,6484,16666,60008,61008,25005,4559,4605,4606,4608,4609,4610,4602,4604,4636,4635,4647,4648,4649,4650,4651,4662,25001,25002,25003,31023,25004,4692,4671,4693,4672,4696,4673,4684,4674,4685,4675,4687,4676,4688,4677,4678,4686,4689,4679,4690,4680,4691,4681,4694,4682,4683,4695,4697;
	waitingroom "โชว์ไอเทมในไข่ต่างๆ",0;
	end;
}
